definitions.definition: A plant of the genus Trifolium with leaves usually divided into three (rarely four) leaflets and with white or red flowers .
The second Lenormand card, representing hope, optimism and short-term luck.

main_definition: A plant of the genus Trifolium with leaves usually divided into three (rarely four) leaflets and with white or red flowers .
secondary_definitions: ( cartomancy ) The second Lenormand card, representing hope, optimism and short-term luck.
